data-flow
*********


Description
===========

Use the Data Flow CLI to run any Apache Spark application at any scale
without deploying or managing any infrastructure.


Available Commands
==================

* application

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* run

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * get-log

  * list

  * list-logs

  * update
